HomeSubtitle: Society is the problem, not the person with the disability
Contact paragraph: Would you like to contact Bureau Onbeperkte Zaken? Then you can do so by filling out the contact form below.
Contact sent successfully: The contact form was send succesfully
IndexPartnerHulp:
This page shows a list of all partners.
 Click a card to edit a partner.
ActionPartnerHulp:
On this page you can edit a Partner.
 It is also possible to add an image by clicking on the media 'library'.
 When you are done, click on 'Add Partner' or 'Edit Partner'
IndexRecommendationHulp:
This page shows a list of all Recommendations.
 Click a card to edit a recommendation.
ActionRecommendationHulp:
On this page you can edit a Recommendation.
 It is also possible to add an image by clicking on the media 'library'.
 When you are done, click on 'Add Recommendation' or 'Edit Recommendation'
IndexProjectHulp:
This page shows a visible list of all projects.
 Click a card to edit a project
ActionProjectHulp:
On this page you can edit a project.
 It is also possible to add an image by clicking on the media 'library'.
 When you are done, click on 'Add project' or 'Edit project'
IndexContactHulp:
This page show a specific message.
 Press the 'Delete' button to delete the message.
DetaillContactHulp:
This page shows a list of all contactforms that have been sent.
 press the 'Read message' to read a specific message.
